metadata.title: CVE-2025-0314 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from17.2 before 17.6.4, 17.7 before 17.7.3, and 17.8 before 17.8.1. Improperrendering of certain file types lead to cross-site scripting.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
